Reviews.Title: “Simple, Comfortable and Self Sufficient”

Reviews.Content: arrival amsterdam friends stuck hotel night sat cafe free wifi internet searching searching accomodate 5 people price range evening fluke stumbled le coin residence miraculously 5 person available decent price advertised hotel found normally acts student housing throughout happy stay hours lugging luggage godsend pros location walking distance main square shopping restaurants etc reasonable price size 5 top floor consisted 2 bed 1 2 beds 1 3 single beds kitchenette desk tv sofa chairs separate quarters shared bathroom sufficient arent decorated amentities youd real hotel necessities cons little outdated freezing night werent aware heat entering elevator doesnt top floor 2 flights narrow stairs luggage person time ourselves price rut couldnt prefer hotel style accomodation youre picky location price ok completely basic definately recommend hotels amsterdam
